forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers before 5pm, then a slight chance of showers and thunderstorms. Partly sunny. High near 83, with temperatures falling to around 80 in the afternoon. Southwest wind around 12 mph, with gusts as high as 22 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Showers And Thunderstorms
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms before 8pm, then showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy. Low around 52, with temperatures rising to around 55 overnight. West wind 6 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New rainfall amounts between three quarters and one inch possible.

forecast.name: Thursday
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers before 8am. Mostly sunny, with a high near 68. West northwest wind around 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New rainfall amounts between a half and three quarters of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Thursday Night

nubsNob.comments: Thank you for making 2024-25 another great season! Stay tuned for updates, we look forward to having you back next year.
